verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Teach us to pray That we may cause The enemy to flee That we his evil Pow'r may bind His priosoners to free{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Teach us to pray And firmly stand Upon the battleground To fight and break The stronghold down The enemy confound{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Teach us to pray And use Thy rod In strong prevailing prayer Beneath Thy blood To shake the earth And powers of the air{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}By prayer and faith O may we learn To labor Lord with Thee To know the victory is ours And Thine authority{/lang-eng}
